p: The genotypes of all variants in the PD patients and the controls did not deviate from the Hardy–Weinberg equilibrium. The Pearson's χ 2 test was used to compare allelic and genotypic frequencies between the PD patients and the controls. As this study involved 3 independent genetic loci, we made a modest correction using the Bonferroni method for multiple comparisons with a statistical significance defined at p < 0.017.
